complete_report.recommendations: To increase sales, Hanes should improve product quality (pre-shrunk cotton, reinforced stitching, consistent sizing), add features (moisture-wicking, varied styles), provide a detailed product description, and actively solicit and respond to customer feedback.  Targeted marketing focusing on comfort and value is also crucial.
